definition: Name of the place (city, town, or census-designated place)
Virginia county or independent city containing the place

allowed_values: Central Virginia, Hampton Roads, Lynchburg Region, Northern Virginia, Richmond Metro, Roanoke-New River, Shenandoah Valley, Southside Virginia, Southwest Virginia
Exurban, Rural Town, Suburban, Urban Core

definition: Population estimate from American Community Survey 2017–2021
Population density in people per square kilometer
Tree Equity Score; higher = more equitable tree coverage
Proportion of land area covered by tree canopy
Temperature difference from urban area average (°F); positive values indicate hotter areas experiencing urban heat island effects
Normalized health burden index; higher = worse health outcomes
Proportion of population living below federal poverty line
Proportion of population identifying as people of color
Proportion of labor force that is unemployed
Proportion of population age 65 and older
